Churn Prediction Using ANN

This document provides a step-by-step guide on how to use Artificial Neural Networks (ANN) for churn prediction using the Churn_Modelling dataset from Kaggle. The dataset contains information about customers who have either chosen to continue their service or left it, and the goal is to predict whether a customer will leave or not based on various features such as credit score, age, tenure, balance, and more. The document explains how to import necessary libraries, load the dataset, and perform data preprocessing before building and training an ANN model.

Key Concepts:

  • Data Preprocessing
  • Churn Prediction
  • Machine Learning
  • Data Analysis
pandas numpy matplotlib seaborn kaggle
